name: SparkOfLife
0:
”Alexa, ask spark of life.”
”Alexa, open spark of life.”
”give me a spark of life.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: spark of life
des: This Amazon Alexa skill will select an inspirational or motivating message just for you. The purpose is to start your day off with a spark of encouragement. It works by invoking the skill with a simple, "Alexa, ask spark of life."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
